suggest.name: suggest
suggest.description: Share your bug or idea for this bot.

deploy.name: deploy
deploy.description: Deploys commands to the server of the bot owner.

panda.name: panda
panda.description: Receive a cute, randomly selected panda image!

hide.name: hide
hide.description: Hide the panda image from the public chat. (defaults to True)

common.condition_failed: You don't have the required permission to perform this action.
common.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact the bot owner by using the {{suggestCommandName}} command.
